name: Square Menace
description:
Square Menace is a hyper casual prototype based on the popular mobile game Square Fall. The objective of the game is simple: avoid having our circle collide with the red squares and score as many points as possible.

To achieve this, the player must click on the screen to make the circle change direction and avoid the falling red squares. If the circle touches a square of the same color, the player scores a point. The longer the player keeps the circle away from the red squares and accumulates points, the more challenging the game becomes.

Square Menace is an exciting and challenging game that will put the player's skills to the test. Give it a try and compete with your friends to see who can get the highest score!
